General.Name: Minerva Intelligence Inc
General.Description: Minerva Intelligence Inc., an artificial intelligence (AI) software company, focuses on building decision support tools for climate risk applications. The company's flagship product includes climate85, a data and analytics platform that provides access to physical climate risk information, as well as forecasting for heat, humidex, precipitation, and wind in various locations for banks and financial institutions, reits, insurers and underwriters, physical infrastructure owners, engineers, scientists, and governments. It also offers proprietary AI software and related consulting services; and software licensing services. Minerva Intelligence Inc. was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 850 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1E1
